participant_2.background:
I spend a lot of my free time researching and buying teapots.
I love to dress up but it's not all about the look, I like to keep my feet on the ground.
I want to drive my truck to the mountains and get some alone time.
I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health.
i love to ride bikes.

content.text: Hey there, what's up?
Hi! Just got back from a quick bike ride. How about you?
I just finished practicing my bass guitar in the lifeguard station.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument. What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll.
Nice! I love rock music too. I really like the Foo Fighters and the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
Those are both great bands! I'm also a big fan of the Arctic Monkeys and the Black Keys.
Ooh, I love the Arctic Monkeys too! I haven't listened to the Black Keys much, but I've heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out! They're a really great band.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
Well, I love to read, write, and go for walks in the park. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
Those are all great things to do! I love to read too, and I also enjoy going for walks in the park.
Oh, cool! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different types of books, but my favorite authors are probably Stephen King and J.K. Rowling.
Nice! I've read some of Stephen King's books, but I haven't read anything by J.K. Rowling yet.
You should definitely check out her Harry Potter series! It's a really great read.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you think? Do you want to go for a walk in the park sometime?
That sounds like fun! I'm free tomorrow afternoon if you are.
Great! I'll meet you at the park at 1pm.
See you then!
